author: chirino
msg: Fix broken link

author: fdmanana
msg: Backport revision 1137928 from trunk
Fix server crash associated with the replicator database
If there's an exception when calculating the replication ID
for a replication document, it crashes the replication manager
gen_server 10 times. 10 is the maximum number of restarts per
hour specified for the couch_server_sup supervisor.
An easy way to trigger such exception is to specify a non
existent filter in a replication document.
This closes COUCHDB-1199.

author: rhuijben
msg: A canonical url to a http:, https: and svn: repository shouldn't contain the
default port number. With a default port number it is a valid url, but it is
not canonical.
Make svn_uri_canonicalize remove default port numbers and svn_is_canonicalize
return false on uris with invalid and/or default port numbers.
* subversion/libsvn_subr/dirent_uri.c
(canonicalize): Handle default port numbers for http, https and svn urls.
(svn_uri_is_canonical): Verify that a port number is a port number and that
a canonical url doesn't contain a default port number.
* subversion/tests/libsvn_subr/dirent_uri-test.c
(test_uri_canonicalize): Test port number canonicalization.
(test_uri_is_canonical): Test a few more not canonical urls.
